pr_title: fix #537 ignore waypoint markers with invalid coordinates on import

timeline.bodyText: This should not be necessary as findAndParseKmlFile() either throws an exception or returns a trackid, right?
timeline.author: dennisguse

replies.bodyText: I came across this when I first experimented with a kmz file for the Unit test. But I had problems with it an the while ZipEntry didn't find any files in the zip input stream. Then it resulted in a null trackId.
replies.author: pstorch

replies.bodyText: Then we should throw an exception in findAndParseKmlFile as the file is broken or am I mistaken?
replies.author: dennisguse

timeline.message:
fix #537 ignore waypoint markers with invalid

coordinates on import.

I've also added a unit test with such an export file.
throw Exception when no doc.kml file found in kmz
throw Exception when no doc.kml file found in kmz
